ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Level 12 needs a new goal
ygData.msgSnippet: If you re in Freeport, head out to the dervish camp in West Commons.  They spawn fast enough to support two groups and drop bronze weapons.  (And they aggro
ygData.messageBody:
If you're in Freeport, head out to the dervish camp in
West Commons. They spawn fast enough to support two
groups and drop bronze weapons. (And they aggro bards
more than the crushbone orcs ever did)

While you're there, see the armoror on the thrid floor
of the Freeport militia bldg and do the Reserve
Militia Tunic quest. They are only AC 9 but +3 dex
and look very cool. Like blood red chain. I had a DE
SK offer me 50 plat for mine the other night in
Lavastorm. Too bad it's no drop;-)

While you're in the commons, watch out for people
asking for help in body recovery -- most of them want
you to go to Kithicor forest...and it seems like most
of them want to go just before nightfall. If that's
the case, make them wait for morning.

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
Bard of the 16th Song

--- Jennifer McComb <mccomb@...>
wrote:
> Over the last few weeks, Adagia's goal was to
> acquire a Dragoon Dirk
> and to reach level 12 so she could finally sing
> Brusco's Boastful
> Bellow. Last weekend her call to purchase a Dirk in
> Crushbone was
> finally answered, and last night she earned the
> right to scribe the
> 12th song. She's currently calling E. Freeport
> home, and she's
> finding the adventures there entertaining, but she
> has suddenly found
> herself without any burning immediate goals. What
> excitement waits
> for a Bard of 12 songs?
>
> Adagia,
> Bard of 12 songs,
> Luclin.
>
>
